title: AppLovin outlines 5%–7% Q1 sequential revenue growth as AI drives platform expansion
description: AppLovin (APP) Q4 2025 earnings call recap: AI-driven growth, 66% revenue surge, 84% EBITDA margin, and Q1 2026 outlook—read key takeaways now.

title: Is Traditional Cybersecurity Dead? How AI and Zero Trust are Changing Protection
description: Hackers are evolving as software becomes sophisticated. Discover AI and zero-trust software that learns your habits and blocks threats before you even notice.

title: Voice AI moves from an add-on to the core for Indian companies
description: As digital services reach deeper into tier-II and III cities, and rural India, companies are rethinking text-heavy and English-first systems in favour of voice-led and Indic-language AI.

title: Spectral AI Promotes CFO and General Counsel to CEO Post
description: Dallas Innovates, Every Day: Here's what's new + next in North Texas.Dallas-based AI-driven wound care company Spectral AI, Inc. announced that the company’s board of directors has appointed Vincent S. Capone as chief executive officer, effective February 9, 2026.Capone, who has been serving as the company’s CFO and general counsel, takes on the CEO role as Spectral AI prepares for the commercialization of its proprietary, non-invasive, AI-driven burn wound assessment device the DeepView System, the company said....The post Spectral AI Promotes CFO and General Counsel to CEO Post appeared first on Dallas Innovates.

title: Facilio Launches Autonomous AI Agents to Automate Manual Back-Office Work in Facilities Management
description: (MENAFN - Facilio) Now live in early enterprise deployments, the Autonomous AI Agents run service, finance, and operations, cutting manual work by up to 40% NEW YORK / DUBAI – 11 February, ...
